ModMetaData.name: Prisoner Ransom
ModMetaData.author: erdelf, Anarcraft
ModMetaData.description: This mod allows you to demand ransom for imprisoned pawns for silver at the comms console. It will give you a slight relationship boost. This doesn't work if the faction is very hostile to you. I don't know what the threshold is, maybe =>90%? Leaders are, of course, worth more and will likely be more friendly to you after that. If the faction doesn't take your demands seriously they will raid you.
